Default
```js
initialState = {};
<div>
  <CheckBox>
    <input
      ref="checkbox1"
      type="checkbox"
      id="checkbox1"
      name="noborder"
    />
    <label style={{marginRight: '10px'}} htmlFor="checkbox1" title="checkbox1">checkbox1</label>
    <input
      ref="checkbox2"
      type="checkbox"
      id="checkbox2"
      name="noborder"
    />
    <label style={{marginRight: '10px'}} htmlFor="checkbox2" title="checkbox2">checkbox2</label>
    <input
      ref="checkbox3"
      type="checkbox"
      id="checkbox3"
      name="noborder"
    />
    <label style={{marginRight: '10px'}} htmlFor="checkbox3" title="checkbox3">checkbox3</label>
  </CheckBox>
</div>
```
Border
```js
initialState = {};
<div style={{display: 'flex'}}>
  <CheckBox border>
    <input
      ref="checkbox4"
      type="checkbox"
      id="checkbox4"
      name="border"
    />
    <label htmlFor="checkbox4" title="checkbox4">checkbox4</label>
  </CheckBox>
  <CheckBox border>
    <input
      ref="checkbox5"
      type="checkbox"
      id="checkbox5"
      name="border"
    />
    <label htmlFor="checkbox5" title="checkbox5">checkbox5</label>
  </CheckBox>
  <CheckBox border>
    <input
      ref="checkbox6"
      type="checkbox"
      id="checkbox6"
      name="border"
    />
    <label htmlFor="checkbox6" title="checkbox6">checkbox6</label>
  </CheckBox>
</div>
```
Purple color
```js
initialState = {};
<div style={{display: 'flex'}}>
  <CheckBox colorStyle="purple">
    <input
      ref="checkbox7"
      type="checkbox"
      id="checkbox7"
      name="purple"
    />
    <label htmlFor="checkbox7" title="checkbox4">checkbox7</label>
  </CheckBox>
  <CheckBox colorStyle="purple">
    <input
      ref="checkbox8"
      type="checkbox"
      id="checkbox8"
      name="purple"
    />
    <label htmlFor="checkbox8" title="checkbox5">checkbox8</label>
  </CheckBox>
  <CheckBox colorStyle="purple">
    <input
      ref="checkbox9"
      type="checkbox"
      id="checkbox9"
      name="purple"
    />
    <label htmlFor="checkbox9" title="checkbox6">checkbox9</label>
  </CheckBox>
</div>
```

Using content prop
```js
initialState = {};
<CheckBox
  onChange={(data) => {console.log(data);}}
  content={[
    {name: 'checkbox 1', value: 'checkbox1'},
    {name: 'checkbox 2', value: 'checkbox2'},
    {name: 'checkbox 3', value: 'checkbox3'}
  ]}
/>
```
